name: Sweet and Sour Lentils and Mango Lettuce Wraps. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe
description: Sweet and Sour Lentils and Mango Lettuce Wraps. Add peanuts, sprouts, carrots. Easy weekday lunch ! use other beans or lentils. Vegan Gluten-free recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup dry brown lentils (I used Indian brown)
2 Tbsp soy sauce  (or coconut aminos for soy-free)
1 tsp Sriracha (optional. or add more chili pasta/hot sauce to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and soak the lentils for atleast half an hour in warm water. Drain, wash and add the lentils, salt, pepper and 1.5 cups water in a pan. Cook covered on high heat. Reduce heat to medium once the water comes to a rapid boil. Check for doneness after 30 minutes. Reduce heat to low-medium and cook uncovered until lentils are tender and the water is almost all gone. (4-5 minutes)

Reduce heat to low-medium and cook uncovered until lentils are tender and the water is almost all gone. (4-5 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Is using cooked lentils form can or slow cooked, add the sauce to the lentils, bring to a boil at medium and simmer for 4 minutes on low-medium. done.
recipeInstructions.name: Is using cooked lentils form can or slow cooked, add the sauce to the lentils, bring to a boil at medium and simmer for 4 minutes on low-medium. done.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix all the ingredients under sauce. Add the sauce to the lentil pan. Mix and cook for 5 minutes. Taste and adjust spice if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Load up lettuce leaves with the Lentils, chopped mango, cilantro and peanuts, and serve.
